scripts.start: cd condor-server && npm install && npm run start
scripts.client: cd condor-client && yarn && npm run start
scripts.server: cd condor-server && yarn && npm run start
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix condor-server && npm install --only=dev --prefix condor-server && npm install --prefix condor-client && npm install --only=dev --prefix condor-client && npm run build --prefix condor-client && npm run build --prefix condor-server
